tech_news.title: Video game hardware sales had a historically bad November in the US - The Verge
tech_news.description: Spending on video game hardware during the month of November dropped 27 percent compared to 2024, according to Circana data.

tech_news.title: Game Awards 2025 Set New Record, Delivering Whopping 171 Million Livestreams Worldwide - Variety
tech_news.description: The 2025 Game Awards show again set new viewership records with an estimated 171 million global livestreams of the full broadcast, up 11% from last year.

tech_news.title: Own a First-Gen Starlink Router? SpaceX Wants to Replace It for Free - PCMag
tech_news.description: SpaceX plans to stop providing updates for its 'Gen 1' router in the near future.

tech_news.title: Fallout 5 Will Exist in a World Where 'The Stories and Events of the Show Happened or Are Happening,' Todd Howard Confirms - IGN
tech_news.description: Fallout 5 will indeed take into account the canon events of the Fallout TV series, Bethesda development chief Todd Howard has confirmed.

tech_news.title: Mercedes-Benz discontinues feature that syncs music to driving - The Verge
